system.simplyskills.unlock: ยง6You have unlocked a specialisation. Re-open the skill tree to see your specialisation tab.
effect.simplyskills.berserking.desc: Grants stacking offensive buffs each time you hit an enemy.
effect.simplyskills.bloodthirsty.desc: Recover HP when you defeat an enemy.
effect.simplyskills.elemental_arrows.des: Your next fully charged bow attack fires homing arrows infused with elemental magic.
effect.simplyskills.rampage.desc: Grants you random buffs when you take damage.
effect.simplyskills.arrow_rain.desc: Your next fully charged bow attack calls down a rain of arrows at the target location.
effect.simplyskills.arcane_volley.desc: Periodically fire Arcane bolts at your target.
effect.simplyskills.frost_volley.desc: Periodically fire Frost bolts at your target.
effect.simplyskills.meteoric_wrath.desc: Periodically summon meteors above nearby hostiles.
effect.simplyskills.immobilize.desc: Inflicts damage and slowness when attempting to move.
effect.simplyskills.arcane_attunement.de: Grants 2% Arcane Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.soul_attunement.desc: Grants 2% Soul Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.holy_attunement.desc: Grants 2% Healing Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.fire_attunement.desc: Grants 2% Fire Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.frost_attunement.des: Grants 2% Frost Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.lightning_attunement: Grants 2% Lightning Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.precision.desc: Grants 2% Spell critical damage and critical chance per stack.
effect.simplyskills.death_mark.desc: Healing and Resistance reduced by %25 per stack.
effect.simplyskills.marksman.desc: Your next fully charged bow attack fires a marksman arrow.
effect.simplyskills.stealth.desc: Grants total invisibility. Effect ends when receiving or dealing damage.
effect.simplyskills.might.desc: Grants 10% increased Melee Damage per stack.
effect.simplyskills.exhaustion.desc: Lose 1% attack damage, attack speed, and move speed per stack.
effect.simplyskills.barrier.desc: Completely negate the next incoming damage.
effect.simplyskills.soulshock.desc: Grants +1 Soul & Lightning Spell Power per stack.
effect.simplyskills.spellforged.desc: Grants +0.25 to all Spell Power per stack.
Periodically cast Judgement on nearby hostiles.
effect.simplyskills.consecration.desc: Consecrate the ground beneath your feet.
effect.simplyskills.taunted.desc: Only capable of targeting the taunting entity.
effect.simplyskills.undying.desc: You cannot drop below 1HP. If you are below 65% HP when the effect ends, take fatal damage.
effect.simplyskills.rage.desc: Gain 0.5% attack damage, attack speed, and damage received per stack.
effect.simplyskills.overload.desc:
Grants you 75% increased spell crit damage & 10% spell crit chance per stack.
Upon exceeding 5 stacks you overload, dealing significant damage to yourself and nearby enemies.

The damage dealt to enemies is scaled by your max HP and Soul spell power.
effect.simplyskills.bladestorm.desc: Causes daggers to rotate around you, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Each stack of Bladestorm increases its attack frequency and grants you 1% additional evasion chance.
effect.simplyskills.anointed.desc: Melee attacks heal nearby allies, and deal AoE damage scaling with your Healing spell power.
effect.simplyskills.vitality_bond.desc: HP synchronised with the other affected entity.
effect.simplyskills.marksmanship.desc: Grants 10% increased Ranged Damage per stack.
effect.simplyskills.agile.desc: Grants 5% increased attack speed, movespeed, spell haste, and ranged damage per stack.
item.simplyskills.gracious_manuscript.to: and grants you a large amount
This is only obtainable in creative.

text.autoconfig.simplyskills.title: Simply Skills
text.autoconfig.simplyskills.option.clie: Enable PlayerEx Compatibility !NOT YET IMPLEMENTED!

Changes attributes to use PlayerEx attributes. 

IMPORTANT: Puffish Skills config folder must be deleted 
and game the restarted for this to take effect.
Reset skill trees on death

Resets all Simply Skills skill trees upon death. 
This erases all points and experience invested.
Disable Default Puffish Skill trees

Disables the default 'Mining' & 'Combat' trees that come
packaged with Puffish Skills.
Enable build sharing

Enables players to use Skill Chronicles made
by other players.
Skill Chronicle Cooldown
The cooldown time for the Skill Chronicle item, in ticks (20 ticks = 1 second).
Remove unlock restrictions

Allows Specialisations to be unlocked without 
pathing to them in the skill tree.
Also allows unlocking more than one specialisation.

Not recommended, except for very particular use-cases.
Spell Haste Cooldown Reduction Modifier

Controls how heavily Spell Haste impacts cooldowns.
A higher value means Spell Haste will further reduce cooldowns.
Minimum achievable cooldown (in seconds)
Limits how short a duration can be reduced to via Spell Haste.
Minimum time between ability use (in seconds)

Limits how often a client can request an ability use from the server.
 Setting this too low may allow for packet spam and impact server performance.
HUD X offset
X Offset of Signature Ability HUD in pixels.
HUD Y offset
Y Offset of Signature Ability HUD in pixels.
Enable Dynamic Damage Resistance (DDR)

Dynamic Damage resistance (DDR) is used to mitigate player powercreep in a setting
where many mods might be interacting in ways that lead to ridiculous damage numbers.

DDR works by reducing the damage an entity receives when DPS relative to their maxHP
exceeds a certain threshold.
Enable DDR Debug Log
Provides a log output of DDR analytics.
DDR Health Requirement
The max HP an entity must have in order to benefit from DDR.
DDR Health Threshold
The percent of maxHP an entity must suffer in damage in order to benefit from DDR.
DDR Amount
The base amount of damage mitigation provided by DDR (Higher is more mitigation).
DDR AttackSpeed Weight
The influence that high attack speed has on DDR (Higher is more mitigation).
